message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you, given your needs. I'm asking for $13,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. However, $9,500 is significantly below what I had in mind.  Could you do $11,500?
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,250. Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?
